markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 41 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 [Avatar Of Walkena](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1707) **Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 60 **Perception** +29; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), smoke vision **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +29, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +34, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +33, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +28, [Walkena Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +33 **Str** +9 **Dex** +4 **Con** +8 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +8 **Items** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10) --- **AC** 40 **Fort** +31 **Ref** +25 **Will** +31 **HP** 380 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** physical 10 **Weaknesses** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 15 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Avatar's Resistance** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76)) **Trigger** The avatar fails or critically fails a saving throw; **Frequency** once per minute; **Effect** [Walkena's](/Deities.aspx?ID=159) will attempts to undo his avatar's fate. The avatar rerolls the saving throw and takes the better result.
**[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 60 feet, DC 38
**Smoke Vision** The avatar ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from smoke.
**Sun's Touch** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)) 10 feet. The avatar of Walkena radiates with an intense light. Creatures that enter or begin their turn in the emanation are [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) and take 3d8 fire damage (DC 35 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). Creatures remain dazzled until they leave the emanation. --- **Speed** 60 feet, [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6) **Melee** holy spear +33 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [versatile fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)), **Damage** 3d12+19 piercing **Melee** fist +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199), [versatile fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)), **Damage** 3d6+19 bludgeoning plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27) **Ranged** sunfire +31 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 3d8+18 fire **Divine Innate Spells** DC 36, attack +28 - **Cantrips (8th)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **5th** [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) - **6th** [Flame Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=120), [Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) - **7th** [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Prismatic Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=233) - **8th** [Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24), [Fire Seeds](/Spells.aspx?ID=117), [Prismatic Wall](/Spells.aspx?ID=234) - **Constant (4th)** [Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6) **[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** 2d4+11 bludgeoning plus 2d8 fire, DC 38 **Pull Down the Sun** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)) The avatar of Walkena plucks a small drop of sunlight from the sky and rains down sunfire on the battlefield. The avatar selects a 20-foot burst within 90 feet. Sunfire rains down in the area, dealing 12d8 fire damage (DC 38 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save) to all creatures that enter or begin their turn in the area. The power of the sun restores the avatar; it instead recovers an equal number of Hit Points while in the area. The sunfire continues to rain until the end of the avatar's next turn. The avatar can't use Pull Down the Sun again for 1d4 rounds. **Radiate Glory** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)) The avatar intensifies its light. All creatures within 30 feet must attempt a DC 38 Fortitude save. The avatar can't use Radiate Glory again for 1d4 rounds. During this time, the avatar's Sun Touch no longer [dazzles](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) creatures.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected and becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.
**Success** The creature is dazzled for 1 round.
**Failure** The creature is [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 round.
**Critical Failure** The creature is blinded for 1 minute.
name: Avatar Of Walkena

All creatures within 30 feet must attempt a DC 38 Fortitude save. The avatar can't use Radiate Glory again for 1d4 rounds. During this time, the avatar's Sun Touch no longer dazzles creatures.
